content:
The Travelshop at Haymarket Station is a convenient place to buy your Ridacard and get information about public transportation in Edinburgh.

**Travelshop at Haymarket Station:**

* **Location:** The Travelshop is located inside Haymarket Station, on the concourse level. You can't miss it!
* **Opening Hours:**
	+ Monday to Saturday: 9:00 am to 5:30 pm
	+ Sunday: 10:00 am to 5:00 pm
* **Payment Methods:** The Travelshop accepts cash, credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, and American Express), and debit cards.
* **Services:** The Travelshop offers a range of services, including:
	+ Ridacard sales and top-ups
	+ Bus and tram tickets
	+ Travel information and advice
	+ Leaflets and brochures for attractions and events in Edinburgh

When you arrive at Haymarket Station, just follow the signs to the Travelshop, and you'll find it easily. The staff are friendly and helpful, so don't hesitate to ask if you have any questions about getting around Edinburgh.

**Tips:**

* Make sure to have some cash with you, just in case the Travelshop's card machines are not working.
* If you're planning to buy a Ridacard, try to avoid peak hours (7-9 am or 4-6 pm) when the Travelshop might be busier.
* The Travelshop also sells tickets for other transportation services, such as ScotRail trains, so you can plan your longer-distance journeys as well.

Now you're all set! You can take the Airlink 100 Bus to Haymarket Station, buy your Ridacard at the Travelshop, and start exploring Edinburgh.
